name: Automated Boat License Renewal Dialogue System
description: An agentic AI system that utilizes voice interaction through Alexa to confirm boat ownership and initiate the renewal process with the boating license board via API integration.
input_requirements: API access to boating license board

banned_tools: Avoid any non-standard APIs without authentication
required_integrations: Third-party API for boating license board
compliance_requirements: Ensure GDPR compliance through proper data handling and user consent

llm_recommended_approach: Develop an Alexa skill that interacts with the user to confirm boat ownership, then uses REST API calls to communicate with the boating license board for renewal. Utilize AWS Lambda for serverless processing.
